product_name: Baffin Mawa Winter Boots - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Made with nubuck leather uppers and grippy rubber outsoles for snowy streets, the practical and stylish Baffin Mawa winter boots for women keep your toes warm when the mercury drops. Nubuck suede leather uppers hold up to daily winter wear. Polyester insulation offers comfort in cold weather down to -4degF. EVA midsoles provide cushioning underfoot. Rubber outsoles on the Baffin Mawa boots grip on snowy surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Made with nubuck leather uppers and grippy rubber outsoles for snowy streets, the practical and stylish Baffin Mawa winter boots for women keep your toes warm when the mercury drops.
